posts.title: A few things about me and here - 关于我和这里
posts.excerpt: Few things about simon and his blog.
posts.text: Few things about simon and his blog. About me12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728class Me { public Me who() { System.out.print("I'm "); return this; } public Me am() { System.out.print("of the millions."); return this; } public Me i() { System.out.print("just one "); return this; } class People { public static final boolean ASKED = true; } public static void main(String[] args) { Me simon = new Me(); if (People.ASKED) { simon.who().i().am(); } }} About here Movies Literatures Talks Codes

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
